default: Kyrio: Talk to my brother, Kapno. I know little of mercantile.
Kyrio: Is there something you need?
quest_greet_the_town: Kyrio: ... Yes, hello. Do you need something?
quest_mysterious_note_1: Kyrio: Huh? A glyph of some sort? I know nothing of such things.
quest_mysterious_note_2: Kyrio: Rather inquisitive, are you? Never turns out well.
quest_mysterious_note_3: Kyrio: Fine, yes, my brother might know. I am busy.
